languages.text: "Проклятье! Мне будет не хватать ее покровительства... не могу сказать то же про ее надменный тон и привычки играть с собеседниками при помощи острых предметов. Что же, завоюю себе новую покровительницу". {n}На губах Комиссара расцветает неунывающая улыбка.{/n}

"Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said of her high-handed manner and her habit of using sharp objects to bring 'fun' to any conversation. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Проклятье! Мне будет не хватать ее покровительства... не могу сказать то же про ее надменный тон и привычки играть с собеседниками при помощи острых предметов. Что же, завоюю себе новую покровительницу". {n}На губах Комиссара расцветает неунывающая улыбка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said about her uppity demeanour and her habit of playing with whomever she's talking to using sharp objects. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said about her uppity demeanour and her habit of playing with whomever she's talking to using sharp objects. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said of her high-handed manner and her habit of using sharp objects to bring 'fun' to any conversation. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “真该死！我还挺怀念她的赞助的……虽然我不太喜欢她盛气凌人的态度，也不怎么喜欢她用尖锐物品让谈话变得更加‘有趣’的习惯。好吧，看来我得想办法，找个新的赞助人了。”{n}政委漫不经心地笑了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said of her high-handed manner and her habit of using sharp objects to bring 'fun' to any conversation. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “真该死！我还挺怀念她的赞助的……虽然我不太喜欢她盛气凌人的态度，也不怎么喜欢她用尖锐物品让谈话变得更加‘有趣’的习惯。好吧，看来我得想办法，找个新的赞助人了。”{n}政委漫不经心地笑了起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「くそ！彼女の支援がなくなるのは残念だが…いつも会話に"面白み"をもたらすために鋭い武器を向けてくるような、あの高圧的な態度にはうんざりしていたところです。仕方ないので新しい後援者を探すとしましょう」{n}コミッサーは淡々と笑った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said of her high-handed manner and her habit of using sharp objects to bring 'fun' to any conversation. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「くそ！彼女の支援がなくなるのは残念だが…いつも会話に"面白み"をもたらすために鋭い武器を向けてくるような、あの高圧的な態度にはうんざりしていたところです。仕方ないので新しい後援者を探すとしましょう」{n}コミッサーは淡々と笑った。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¡Maldita sea! Echaré de menos su apoyo... aunque no tanto su actitud altiva y su costumbre de usar objetos punzantes para "dar gracia" a las conversaciones. Bueno, me tocará ganarme a una nueva patrona». {n}El Comisario sonríe, despreocupado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said of her high-handed manner and her habit of using sharp objects to bring 'fun' to any conversation. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Maldita sea! Echaré de menos su apoyo... aunque no tanto su actitud altiva y su costumbre de usar objetos punzantes para "dar gracia" a las conversaciones. Bueno, me tocará ganarme a una nueva patrona». {n}El Comisario sonríe, despreocupado.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said of her high-handed manner and her habit of using sharp objects to bring 'fun' to any conversation. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}

languages.text: « Merde ! Sa protection va me manquer... même si je ne peux pas en dire de même de ses manières despotiques et de son habitude de sortir des objets tranchants pour égayer les conversations. Bon, je n'ai plus qu'à me trouver une nouvelle protectrice, j'imagine, » {n}conclut le commissaire avec un sourire nonchalant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said of her high-handed manner and her habit of using sharp objects to bring 'fun' to any conversation. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Merde ! Sa protection va me manquer... même si je ne peux pas en dire de même de ses manières despotiques et de son habitude de sortir des objets tranchants pour égayer les conversations. Bon, je n'ai plus qu'à me trouver une nouvelle protectrice, j'imagine, » {n}conclut le commissaire avec un sourire nonchalant.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Verdammt! Ich werde ihren Schutz vermissen ... im Gegensatz zu ihrer hochmütigen Art und ihrer Angewohnheit, mit scharfen Gegenständen 'Spaß' in jedes Gespräch zu bringen. Nun, ich werde wohl eine neue Gönnerin für mich gewinnen müssen." {n}Der Kommissar lächelt gleichmütig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said of her high-handed manner and her habit of using sharp objects to bring 'fun' to any conversation. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Verdammt! Ich werde ihren Schutz vermissen ... im Gegensatz zu ihrer hochmütigen Art und ihrer Angewohnheit, mit scharfen Gegenständen 'Spaß' in jedes Gespräch zu bringen. Nun, ich werde wohl eine neue Gönnerin für mich gewinnen müssen." {n}Der Kommissar lächelt gleichmütig.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Kahretsin! Onun hamiliğini özleyeceğim. Hoş, aynısını zorbaca davranışları ve konuşmalarımızı 'daha eğlenceli' kılmak adına keskin nesnelere başvurma eğilimi için söyleyemeyeceğim. Neyse, yeni bir hami bulup gözüne girmem gerekecek artık." {n}Komiser umursamazca gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Damn it! I'll miss her patronage... though the same can't be said of her high-handed manner and her habit of using sharp objects to bring 'fun' to any conversation. Well, I'll just have to win over a new patroness." {n}The Commissar smiles nonchalantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kahretsin! Onun hamiliğini özleyeceğim. Hoş, aynısını zorbaca davranışları ve konuşmalarımızı 'daha eğlenceli' kılmak adına keskin nesnelere başvurma eğilimi için söyleyemeyeceğim. Neyse, yeni bir hami bulup gözüne girmem gerekecek artık." {n}Komiser umursamazca gülümsüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
